title: Prisoners in a PRISM - Why Darknets Will Become More Popular.epu
description:
A look at the current state of the U.S., the digital revolution that is at hand, and what we as a people can do to stop interference by the government in our private lives.

I am the author of this book.  I have released it as a torrent in hopes that readers will spread the word, enjoy it enough to buy it (currently $0.99 on Amazon for Kindle), and if they agree with my views and opinions will follow me on my Facebook page.  All relative links to buy and follow me on Facebook are included in the book.

I believe in the open Internet, Free Speech, and other liberties including privacy. I have purposefully released this copy of my work as a torrent to allow for that liberty and in good faith that it will spread the word of my works, a few who download this torrent will buy it, and those who are interested in me and what I have to say and do will follow me.


-RJS
